mapper.select: SELECT m.name, dl.license_number AS licenseNumber, dl.id_card_number AS idCardNumber, dl.license_type AS licenseType, dl.issuing_agency AS issuingAgency, dl.image_url AS imageUrl, dl.issued_date AS issuedDate, dl.expiry_date AS expiryDate FROM driver_license dl INNER JOIN member m ON dl.member_id = m.member_id WHERE dl.member_id = #{memberId}
